subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Mughal Emperor never visited Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन से मुगल मुखा राजा राजस्थान में विचारण नहीं द्वारा जानी पहुंची वर्ग का एक विचारक मुखा राजा कौन था।
explanation_en:
Zahirudin Khan, also known as Zahirudin Kang, was a Mughal Emperor who never visited Rajasthan.
In contrast, Firangi Maulana, also known as Firangi Malik, was a famous Sufi saint who came from outside India and settled in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: फिरंगी माओलान नामे सब्दी कांग एक मुगल राजा थे जो राजस्थान में विवास नहींगर कांग को करते हेंगर कांग के नामे सब्दी कांग को अर्थांगी माओलान को करते हेंगर कांग को कोशमियांगी माओलान
explanation_en: Zahirudin Khan, also known as Zahirudin Malik, was a Mughal Emperor who ruled Rajasthan. On the other hand, Firangi Malik was a famous Sufi saint who settled in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: सुतिर्षियांगी माओलान एक मुगल राजा थे जिनोंगर को कोशमियांगी माओलान
question_en: Who was the Mughal Emperor during the British rule in Rajasthan?
question_hi: ब्रिटिक सर्वोत्र के दौरे में राजस्थान में पहले के आदमी को कोशमियांगी माओलान

options_en.option_explain: Aurangzeb was a Mughal Emperor during the British rule in Rajasthan.
Firangi Malik was a famous Sufi saint who settled in Rajasthan and not an emperor.
Jahan Khan was a general under Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb, but not an emperor himself.
Zahiruddin Khan, also known as Zahirudin Malik, was a Mughal Emperor who ruled Rajasthan during the British rule.

option_explain_hi.option_explain: औरंगनी मालक एक सत्तार संतर हेंगी मालक

explanation_en: Zahirudin Khan, also known as Zahiruddin Malik, was a Mughal Emperor who ruled Rajasthan.
